name: The Revolution Is Nigh
text:
This Skill's second effect can be used once per Duel.
1: At the start of the Duel, add 1 "Chevalier de Fleur" to your Extra Deck.
2: Can be used before your normal draw if your Life Points are at 3000 or below. One of the cards from your normal draw this turn will be 1 "Fleur Synchron" from your Deck.
